ResumeParserData.Experience: Goldman Sachs  Senior Business Analyst  April 2010 - Present  Manchester, UK  At Goldman Sachs, I led numerous high-impact projects that significantly improved operational efficiency. I conducted comprehensive requirements gathering sessions with stakeholders from various departments, ensuring that business needs were accurately captured and addressed. My role involved identifying and implementing process improvements that led to a 25% increase in efficiency. Utilizing advanced data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, and Tableau, I provided actionable insights that informed strategic decisions. I managed multiple projects using both Agile and Waterfall methodologies, consistently delivering them on time and within budget. Additionally, I maintained clear and effective communication with senior management and project teams, ensuring alignment with project goals. I also ensured that all business analysis activities complied with regulatory requirements and internal policies.  BNY Mellon  Business Analyst  May 2005 - March 2010  Manchester, UK  During my tenure at BNY Mellon, I collaborated with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements, translating them into actionable project plans. I played a key role in process improvement initiatives, which resulted in a 20% cost reduction. My responsibilities included conducting detailed data analysis to support strategic planning and preparing comprehensive reports and presentations for senior management. I managed projects from initiation to completion, ensuring they met quality standards and were delivered on schedule. I also facilitated communication between business and technical teams to ensure project success.  JP Morgan Chase  Junior Business Analyst  January 2002 - April 2005  Manchester, UK  In my early career at JP Morgan Chase, I assisted senior analysts in gathering and analyzing business requirements for various projects. I supported process optimization efforts that improved operational efficiency. My role involved conducting data analysis and generating reports to support decision-making. I also participated in project planning and execution, maintaining effective communication with project stakeholders to ensure project alignment.

My career has been marked by a consistent ability to deliver strategic solutions that enhance business performance and drive efficiency. I am dedicated to fostering effective communication with stakeholders and ensuring compliance with regulatory standards.
